page.title: 13RELIGION: GENERAL
page.content: ANGLICANS ARE CALLED THE NATEBY CHURCH MISSION. THE KIRKBY STEPHEN VICAR CONDUCTS A SERVICE ONCE MONTHLY IN THE VILLAGE HALL.ANNUAL EVENTS INCLUDE (1) HARVEST FESTIVAL WITH PROCEEDS GIVEN TO THE BISHOP'S HARVEST APPEAL AND CANCER RESEARCH (2) CAROL SERVICE AND TEA WITH PROCEEDS GIVEN TO CHURCH OF ENGLAND CHILDREN'S SOCIETY (3) MONEY- RAISING EFFORT FOR THEIR OWN EXPENSES METHODISTS HAVE THEIR OWN CHURCH BUIL- DING WHICH INCLUDES A SUNDAY SCHOOL- ROOM.SERVICES ARE HELD EVERY SUNDAY AT 2.00 PM AND ALTERNATE SUNDAY EVENINGS, CONDUCTED BY ORDAINED MINISTER OR LAY PREACHER. 26 MEMBERS PAY ASSESSMENT OF Â£12 PER MEMBER PER QUARTER TO CIR- CUIT FUND TO COVER STIPENDS ETC. AN ANNUAL MEETING OF ALL MEMBERS APPOINTS CHURCH OFFICERS. ROMAN CATHOLICS WORSHIP IN KIRKBY STEPHEN.
